data.eml:eml: Six new species of Te t r a Keifer (Acari: Eriophyidae: Phyllocoptinae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xue, Xiao-Feng, Song, Zi-Wei, Hong, Xiao-Yue (2007): Six new species of Te t r a Keifer (Acari: Eriophyidae: Phyllocoptinae) from China. Zootaxa 1614: 1-16, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179043
